    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    ButtonForMap(Tile tile)

    IslandView(IslandViewContainer islandViewContainer, Tile[][] island)
    constructs a new IslandView and add the previously built Buttons which are referenced in the Tile array to the IslandView one by one

    Methods in de.jhh4.logic with parameters of type Tile
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    PieceMover.action(Tile tile)
    build a structure if there is a unit and no structure.
    private void
    PieceMover.buildFarms(Tile tile)
    builds a farm on every surrounding Plains tile
    private void
    PieceMover.buildLumbermills(Tile tile)
    builds a Lumbermill on every surrounding Lumbermill tile
    private void
    PieceMover.buildStructure(Tile tile)
    a settler builds a town on plains or forest tiles a worker/miner builds an outpost/mine on a mountain tile a newly founded town must have a distance of at least two tiles to the nearest town.
    private static int
    ResourceCollector.collectFood(Tile town)
    helper method to collect Food from surrounding tiles
    static void
    ResourceCollector.collectGold(Tile mine)
    collects 1 gold (stone) from the tile where a mine (outpost) was built increases the score counter by 1 increases the stone storage by 1 (currently not used)
    private static int
    ResourceCollector.collectStone(Tile town)
    helper method to collect Food from all 9 tiles
    static void
    ResourceCollector.collectSurroundingResources(Tile town)
    checks all surrounding 8 tiles and the tile of the town for ressources produced and collects them also increases the score by the amount of gold(stone) collected this turn
    private static int
    ResourceCollector.collectWood(Tile town)
    helper method to collect Food from surrounding tiles
    private boolean
    PieceMover.ensureNoOverlap(Tile tile)
    ensures that a town founded on this tile does not have overlapping neighbouring tiles with another city
    static void
    RealEstateManager.registerOutpost(Tile newOutpostTile)
    registers an outpost on the list for outposts for resource collection
    static void
    RealEstateManager.registerTown(Tile newTownTile)
    registers a town on the list for towns for resource collection
    void
    LogicCenter.setIsland(Tile[][] island)

  • Uses of Tile in de.jhh4.tiles

    Subclasses of Tile in de.jhh4.tiles
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    Forest
    forests can be traversed and provide one wood
    class 
    Mountain
    Mountain tiles can currently be traversed to allow for worker placement of outposts/mines provides gold/stone when worked
    class 
    Ocean
    Oceans are at the border of the map and limit the game are, providing one food
    class 
    Plains
    plains can be traversed and provide one food
